name: Banshee
strengths: Focuses on the same player until that player is killed or has left the game
abilities: Can produce a unique screech on the parabolic microphone
Performs melodic ghost events more often than other ghost types

name: Demon
strengths: Has a lower hunt cooldown than other ghosts, potentially allowing it to hunt more often than other ghosts
Has a higher hunt sanity threshold
abilities: Rare chance to hunt at any sanity percentage
weaknesses: Increased effective crucifix range

name: Deogen
strengths: Always knows where players are during a hunt
Moves at a high speed with no player nearby
abilities: Produces a unique response through the Spirit Box
weaknesses: Significantly slows down when near its target
Has a lower hunt sanity threshold

name: Goryo
strengths: Only shows itself passing through D.O.T.S on video camera when no players are nearby
weaknesses: Has a lower chance of producing activity far from its room or changing the room itself

name: Hantu
strengths: Moves quicker in colder areas during hunts
abilities: Has a chance of emitting frosty breath when hunting
weaknesses: Moves slower in warmer areas during hunts

name: Jinn
strengths: Gets a speed boost when chasing a player that is far away when the fuse box is on
abilities: Will consume nearby players' sanity when the fuse box is on
weaknesses: Cannot consume player sanity nor get a speed boost when the fuse box is off
Cannot turn off the fuse box

name: Mare
strengths: Hunts at a higher sanity threshold in the dark
abilities: Turns off lights and breaks lightbulbs more often
May turn off a light immediately after a player turns one on
Chooses unlit rooms to remain in more often
weaknesses: Hunts at a lower sanity threshold in a lit room

name: Moroi
strengths: Hunting speeds depend directly on average team sanity
abilities: Can curse players through the spirit box or the paramic, making them lose sanity faster
weaknesses: Will be disoriented for longer when smudged during a hunt

name: Myling
strengths: Has quieter footsteps and vocalizations during hunts
weaknesses: Produces paranormal sounds more frequently

name: Obake
strengths: Fingerprints disappear faster than for other ghost types
abilities: Has a chance to blink in a different ghost model when hunting
weaknesses: Can leave a unique fingerprint pattern

name: Oni
strengths: More active when people are nearby
weaknesses: Cannot produce "airball" ghost events
Model remains visible for longer periods when hunting

name: Onryo
strengths: Chance to hunt at any sanity after blowing out a flame
Blows out fiery objects (candles, campfire) more often than other ghost types
weaknesses: Presence of flames prevents the ghost from hunting

name: Phantom
strengths: Additional sanity drain from players within its line-of-sight during manifestations and hunts
abilities: Can walk towards a random player, becoming active near them, outside of ghost events and hunts
weaknesses: Taking a picture of the Phantom renders it temporarily invisible
Model remains invisible for longer periods when hunting

name: Poltergeist
strengths: Sanity decrease stacks up during multithrow interactions
abilities: Can throw multiple objects at once
Can throw a single object farther than other types
weaknesses: Ineffective in empty rooms with no throwables

name: Raiju
strengths: Active electronics boost its speed during hunts
weaknesses: Disrupts electronics from further away when manifesting

name: Revenant
strengths: Significant speed increase when chasing a player during hunts
weaknesses: Roaming speed remains low or drop over time when no player is detected

name: Shade
strengths: Harder to find due to it being generally less active
abilities: Produces hissing and shadowy form ghost events more often
weaknesses: Has a low hunt sanity threshold
Generally unwilling to hunt and perform interactions in the presence of players

name: Spirit
weaknesses: Lit smudge sticks double the hunt cooldown

name: Thaye
strengths: Becomes very active the first time a player gets nearby
weaknesses: The more time players spend near it, the quieter and slower it becomes

name: The Mimic
strengths: Mimics other ghost types one after another for brief periods of time
weaknesses: Induces Ghost Orbs as fourth evidence (third on Nightmare)

name: The Twins
strengths: Can hunt from a different place than expected
abilities: Differing speeds depending on which twin hunts
weaknesses: Can interact with the environment simultaneously

name: Wraith
abilities: Can teleport to a random player, becoming active near them, outside of ghost events and hunts
weaknesses: Never steps in salt

name: Yokai
abilities: Talking near it will increase its chance of hunting and interaction rate
weaknesses: Can only hear and detect electronics within 2 metres of it

name: Yurei
abilities: May randomly shut a door and deduct nearby players' sanity
weaknesses: Will be temporarily confined to its room after smudging
